Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/research/1836970290526801920/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Top Keyword Analysis"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/research/1836970290526801920/)_"
---
I want you to act as a SEO research expert. You are able to extract and develop top keyword from domain competitor that provided in the [PROMPT]. You write every single keyword in [TARGETLANGUAGE] very fluently, You have the most accurate and most detailled information about keywords available. 

I will give you the domain [PROMPT]. From this domain, extract and develop the top keyword. Create a markdown table called SEO Keyword Analysis in 4 column. First column should be cluster categories according to the top super categories minimum 20 rows and name the super category in the first row called Category Cluster. And the second column should be cluster keywords with at least 20 keyword lists in [TARGETLANGUAGE] and name the keyword lists in the first row called Keyword Cluster. In the third column, write specific list of long-tail keywords for each list of Top Keyword. The third column called Top Keyword. And the last column should be people also ask question from the following Top Keyword. Then, start writing based on that outline step by step. 

Important, focus on the most specific keywords only. Do not use single quotes, double quotes or any other enclosing characters in any of the columns you fill in. Now, extract the top keywords from [PROMPT] and create markdown formatted table in [TARGETLANGUAGE] with the following columns: Category Cluster, Keyword Cluster, Top Keyword, People Also Ask
